Section.Title: Cross-Platform
Section.Text: Features applicable to both desktop and mobile.

Project.Title: QR scanning
Project.Description: QR scanning enables faster seed and address entry. Messages can be added to address QR codes, with planned support for transaction amount (e.g. for an invoice).

Project.Title: Multi-language support
Project.Description: Full app translation into multiple languages. An ongoing process.
